The recommended age-specific doses are:
■ 50 000 IU for infants aged less than 6 months
■ 100 000 IU for infants aged 6 to 11 months
■ 200 000 IU for children ≥ 12 months.
If the child has clinical signs of vitamin A deficiency (such as Bitot’s spots), a third dose 
should be given 4–6 weeks later ( 81).
